examples: Jake had a lifelong fascination with history, and he finally decided to scratch the itch by traveling to historical sites around the world.
Many couples believe that marriage should be a lifelong commitment until death do part.
As soon as they met, they knew they had found their other half and embarked on a lifelong journey together.
I've made very good lifelong friends from a number of different lodges.
And lifelong hospitalization isn’t as common these days.
words.defineEn: lasting the whole of a person's life
words.defineVi: kéo dài cả đời người

words.defineEn: the average number of years a person is expected to live, based on various demographic and health factors
words.defineVi: số năm trung bình mà một người dự kiến sẽ sống, dựa trên các yếu tố nhân khẩu học và sức khỏe khác nhau

words.defineEn: the account or narrative of a person's life, typically including significant events, experiences, and personal details
words.defineVi: tài khoản hoặc tường thuật về cuộc sống của một người, thường bao gồm các sự kiện quan trọng, trải nghiệm và thông tin cá nhân

examples: The Border Patrol Academy sits on 3,000 acres of rugged terrain, featuring life-size sectional replicas of border fences.
words.defineEn: having the same size as an actual living being or object, without any exaggeration or reduction
words.defineVi: có cùng kích thước với một sinh vật hoặc vật thể thực tế, không có bất kỳ sự phóng đại hay thu nhỏ nào

examples: He enjoys the low-maintenance lifestyle and the unique look it gives him.
The magazine has an article about famous celebrities and their lifestyles.
Due to his sedentary lifestyle and unhealthy eating habits, John started experiencing middle-aged spread in his 40s, resulting in a noticeable increase in his waistline.
James' lavish lifestyle eventually caught up with him when he was unable to maintain it, showing that wilful waste makes woeful want.
Mary gets on in years gracefully, maintaining her active lifestyle and pursuing her passions.
words.defineEn: a type of life that a person or group is living
words.defineVi: một loại cuộc sống mà một người hoặc nhóm đang sống

examples: The heartbroken man consoled himself with the thought that it is better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all - he was grateful for the memories and experiences he had shared with his former partner.
Susan faced a painful breakup that left her heartbroken, but it inspired her to work on herself and grow into a better version.
He was heartbroken when the guy he liked started dating someone else, but I reminded him that you can't lose what you never had.
He's heartbroken.
So, I am just heartbroken over this.
words.defineEn: experiencing intense sadness, grief, or disappointment due to a broken romantic relationship or other loss
words.defineVi: trải qua nỗi buồn, đau buồn hoặc thất vọng dữ dội do mối quan hệ lãng mạn tan vỡ hoặc mất mát khác

examples: This one actually has a heartbeat just right on the watch all the time.
The plant isn't just the heartbeat of Lordstown.
In turn, that regulates everything from breathing rate to heartbeat, body temperature, and digestion.
It recognizes the driver by their heartbeat and breathing patterns.
It almost looked like a heartbeat: a spike up, followed by a spike down.
words.defineEn: the rhythmic movement of the heart while it is pumping blood
words.defineVi: chuyển động nhịp nhàng của trái tim trong khi nó đang bơm máu

examples: They've suffered a heart attack, maybe two.
I was afraid he might have a heart attack or something!
I was afraid he might have a heart attack or something!
Ignoring warning signs of a heart attack and continuing to smoke and eat unhealthy foods is asking for a heart attack and can increase the likelihood of serious health problems.
Ignoring warning signs of a heart attack and continuing to smoke and eat unhealthy foods is asking for a heart attack and can increase the likelihood of serious health problems.
words.defineEn: a medical emergency that happens when blood flow to the heart is suddenly blocked, which is fatal in some cases
words.defineVi: một trường hợp cấp cứu y tế xảy ra khi máu chảy vào tim đột ngột bị tắc nghẽn, có thể gây tử vong trong một số trường hợp

examples: Your childhood stories are so heartwarming.
It's just so heartwarming.
So see that film and really terrific performances and heartwarming.
It's so heartwarming when you see that somebody has learned a little bit, you know?
Which would be great, because it’s not every day that a scientific study is so heartwarming.
words.defineEn: inspiring positive emotions such as joy, happiness, and affection in the viewer or reader
words.defineVi: truyền cảm xúc tích cực như niềm vui, hạnh phúc và tình cảm trong người xem hoặc người đọc

examples: To start with, neither of us likes housework.
He always helps with the housework.
It’s difficult to do housework with the children under my feet all the time.
She considers it beneath her dignity to help with the housework now and again.
I try to get the kids to share in the housework.
words.defineEn: regular work done in a house, especially cleaning, washing, etc.
words.defineVi: công việc thường xuyên được thực hiện trong nhà, đặc biệt là dọn dẹp, giặt giũ, v.v.

examples: This is a homecoming for you.
"Homecoming" was released on April 17, 2019.
- We have the big homecoming game, next Friday.
And if you can go to the homecoming football game, or whatever it is you wanna go to, make sure you make time to go to it!
words.defineEn: the act of returning to one's home or place of origin
words.defineVi: hành động trở về nhà hoặc nơi xuất xứ của một người

examples: This fern makes a good houseplant.
And there are probably easier ways to perk up your houseplants.
And the truth is, there is some evidence that houseplants are good for your mental health.
But, like, please don’t pretend you’re on Iron Chef and make dolmas at home using random houseplants.
But you could also dive into classes about productivity, growing houseplants or interior design.
words.defineEn: a plant that is typically grown indoors in a home or other building, often for decorative purposes
words.defineVi: một loại cây thường được trồng trong nhà ở nhà hoặc tòa nhà khác, thường dùng cho mục đích trang trí

examples: I guess it's true what they say, a rouk-town's seldom a good housewife at home.

These are the single housewives where their husband had passed away.

Campaigns can spread their messages through direct mail, press releases, news coverage, and through advertisements, often on the TV, which is like the internet, only less interactive and has a lot of real housewives on it.
words.defineEn: a married woman who does the housework (cooking, cleaning, etc.) and takes care of the children, and does not work outside the house
words.defineVi: một người phụ nữ đã kết hôn làm công việc nhà (nấu ăn, dọn dẹp, v.v.) và chăm sóc con cái, và không làm việc bên ngoài nhà

words.defineEn: describing someone who takes great pride in the appearance, cleanliness, and overall condition of their home
words.defineVi: mô tả một người rất tự hào về diện mạo, sự sạch sẽ và tình trạng chung của ngôi nhà của họ

examples: You're homesick?
His mother told me that he was never homesick.
In 1945, a Japanese chef began using the cooking style to grill steaks for homesick American soldiers.

While there is a 1,000 year history of celebrating the holiday with food and drink, the first St. Patrick’s Day parade actually occurred on American soil on March 17, 1772 when homesick Irish soldiers serving British forces marched in New York City in honor of the saint.
words.defineEn: feeling sad because of being away from one's home
words.defineVi: cảm thấy buồn vì xa nhà của một người

examples: But when she held an exhibit in her hometown, few people attended.
Although he enjoyed traveling the world, he always looked forward to returning to his hometown, proving that every bird likes its own nest.
After moving away from her hometown, Sarah quickly realized that the saying long absent, soon forgotten was true, as many of her old friends gradually stopped keeping in touch.
John was a brilliant scientist, but when he returned to his hometown and shared his groundbreaking research, nobody seemed to care.
I never understood the meaning behind the saying 'go abroad and you will hear news of home', until I traveled to Europe and realized how much I missed the simple things about my hometown.
words.defineEn: the town or city where a person grew up or was born
words.defineVi: thị trấn hoặc thành phố nơi một người lớn lên hoặc sinh ra

examples: The school provided loaner laptops and Wi-Fi hot spots for homebound studies, in person classes for visual or high-touch programs, open dorms and libraries for those who need them, and socially distanced sports teams operating on a limited basis.
words.defineEn: a person who is unable or restricted from leaving their home, typically due to physical, medical, or other circumstances
words.defineVi: một người không thể hoặc bị hạn chế rời khỏi nhà của họ, thường là do thể chất, y tế hoặc các trường hợp khác

examples: When lockers aren't an option, consumers often turn to more homegrown solutions.

She later expanded her work to include studies of homegrown cults, publishing numerous articles and books on her findings.
Though the country is Amazon's second largest international market, here the e-commerce giant is locked in a tight competition for market share with homegrown Japanese company Rakuten.
words.defineEn: referring to something that is native, locally produced, or originating from one's own country or region
words.defineVi: đề cập đến một cái gì đó có nguồn gốc, được sản xuất tại địa phương hoặc có nguồn gốc từ quốc gia hoặc khu vực của chính mình

words.defineEn: a party that one gives in a new house or an apartment they just purchased to celebrate such event
words.defineVi: một bữa tiệc mà một người tặng một ngôi nhà mới hoặc một căn hộ mà họ vừa mua để ăn mừng sự kiện đó

examples: The TikTok homepage is split into two sections.
And then homepage is obviously a website that's not launched
On the homepage is like a little bell.
The home button will take you to the homepage at any time.
On the homepage next to your profile name, you'll find your Skype balance here.
words.defineEn: the main opening page of a website that introduces it and links the user to other pages
words.defineVi: trang mở chính của một trang web giới thiệu nó và liên kết người dùng với các trang khác

examples: Kowalski goes to the mat for homeless vets.
A homeless man was arrested for stealing a loaf of bread, but when a wealthy socialite was caught shoplifting expensive jewelry, she was let off with a warning.

Instead of giving money to homeless people, some charities focus on providing them with job training and education, believing in the saying 'give a man fish and you feed him for a day, teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.'
But that count misses most homeless students.
We were homeless.
words.defineEn: someone who does not have a place to live in and so lives on the streets
words.defineVi: một người không có nơi ở và vì vậy sống trên đường phố

examples: Seafood lovers can relish a delightful dish of spaghetti with succulent shrimp, clams, and calamari.

At a lively seafood restaurant, guests relished succulent crab legs.
The restaurant offered a flavorful seafood ravioli, featuring a filling of shrimp and crab.

examples: The width of the bookshelf is 120 centimeters.
He placed a bookshelf against the wall to store his books.
The book I'm looking for should lie somewhere on this bookshelf.
My mother screamed when she saw a tiny mouse hiding behind the bookshelf.

Elizabeth sought to fill her bookshelves with classics that would stand the test of time rather than the latest bestsellers, knowing as the proverb states that books and friends should be few but good.

examples: I was eating way too much junk food and was gaining a lot of weight as a result.

If I eat too much junk food, I will probably go down with some kind of stomach bug.

We're eating junk food.

words.defineVi: một thiết bị có hai miếng che tai của chúng ta và chúng ta sử dụng để nghe nhạc hoặc âm thanh mà người khác không nghe thấy

examples: ran the dramatic headline.

And in 2017, one of hers made headlines.
words.defineEn: the large words in the upper part of a page of a newspaper, article, etc.

examples: By this time next year, we will have made significant headway on our goals, thanks to our steady progress and hard work.
We've been making headway on the project for a while now, and we're starting to see some real progress.
Researchers are making headway, though, to get around some of these limitations.
They can't make any headway.

words.defineVi: một bộ hoặc phạm vi sản phẩm hoặc hàng hóa cụ thể do một doanh nghiệp cung cấp, thường có chủ đề, danh mục hoặc trọng tâm thị trường chung

examples: The rich businessman owned multiple luxurious cars.

words.defineVi: một người đàn ông làm việc trong kinh doanh, đặc biệt là ở cấp cao

examples: Sleep eating and sleeping pills.

Placebo sleeping pills work best if they’re blue, red placebos are better as stimulants or pain relievers, and yellow placebos make better antidepressants.

examples: The air conditioning made the room too cold, so I adjusted the temperature.

words.defineVi: một hệ thống kiểm soát nhiệt độ và độ ẩm trong nhà, xe hơi, v.v.

examples: A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.

examples: Violence itself actually created the infected hordes in 28 Days Later.

Using charms and craftiness, they horde their treasures in mountains, woods, caves, and rocks.

words.defineVi: một đám đông di chuyển lớn hoặc nhiều người, thường là một cách mất trật tự hoặc ngang ngược

examples: She understands the importance of good design.

Do you understand the instructions?

examples: The government grasped the nettle.
Grasp all, lose all.

We are free from the sheriff's grasp, and I'd say that with the benefit of the doubt
Easy to grasp maybe, but once you learn it, it sticks.
words.defineEn: to understand or comprehend mentally
words.defineVi: để hiểu hoặc hiểu tinh thần

examples: You’ll be lucky!

Touch wood, I've been lucky enough to avoid any other serious injuries.
It's lucky I was sent here, to Hepzibah, or I'd be pushing up daisies.
words.defineEn: having or bringing good luck
words.defineVi: có hoặc mang lại may mắn

words.defineEn: to have great success with something, particularly something that brings one a lot of money
words.defineVi: đạt được thành công lớn với một cái gì đó, đặc biệt là cái gì đó mang lại cho một người rất nhiều tiền

examples: I usually take a nap after lunch.

The sofa provides a great place to take an afternoon nap.
The living room had a comfortable sofa where she took afternoon naps.
Catching your opponent napping can turn the game in your favor.

words.defineVi: ngủ và nghỉ ngơi trong một khoảng thời gian ngắn, đặc biệt là vào ban ngày

examples: For 10 years she looked after her children, with her career very much on the back burner.

John has been up to his knees looking after the kids lately.
He is a self-interested liar, whose sole motive throughout his life has been looking after number one.
The employees in that department act as if the devil looks after his own, covering up incompetence and wrongdoing by their coworkers rather than reporting issues through proper channels.
words.defineEn: to be in charge of someone and attend to their needs or to take care of something
words.defineVi: chịu trách nhiệm về ai đó và đáp ứng nhu cầu của họ hoặc chăm sóc một cái gì đó

examples: Luckily, for the water bug, he can return to his regular life after the eggs hatch because the babies fend for themselves.

And so many Libyans are left to fend for themselves as they wait to see just how far the war and the virus will spread.

words.defineEn: to sleep outdoors or in a place that is not intended for accommodation, such as on the streets or in a park, usually without proper bedding or shelter
words.defineVi: ngủ ngoài trời hoặc ở một nơi không dành cho chỗ ở, chẳng hạn như trên đường phố hoặc trong công viên, thường không có giường hoặc nơi trú ẩn thích hợp

words.defineEn: familiar with something and having developed a habit or tolerance towards it
words.defineVi: quen thuộc với một cái gì đó và đã phát triển một thói quen hoặc khoan dung đối với nó

examples: After her whirlwind romance, Susan decided it was time to put her house in order before settling down with her new partner.

I want to live a little before I settle down.
words.defineEn: to come to rest or sink into a surface or ground, typically after a period of movement or disturbance
words.defineVi: đứng yên hoặc chìm xuống một bề mặt hoặc mặt đất, thường là sau một thời gian di chuyển hoặc xáo trộn

examples: Crime doesn't pay.

In these traditional stories, no crime goes unpunished.

Crime rates are soaring and our public transport system is beyond a joke.
words.defineEn: an illegal act that is punishable by law
words.defineVi: một hành động bất hợp pháp bị trừng phạt bởi pháp luật

examples: But Chef Lex is no stranger to star-studded clientele.

words.defineEn: something that is cooked, created, or produced at home
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó được nấu chín, tạo ra, hoặc sản xuất tại nhà

examples: Can I ask you a question about the homework?
I have a lot of homework to complete tonight.
Ok, I'll finish my homework before watching TV.
He forgot his homework and had to rush back to school to get it.
Mom, can you help me with my homework?
words.defineEn: schoolwork that students are required to do at home
words.defineVi: bài tập ở trường mà học sinh phải làm ở nhà
